Name: Death Wish
Author: Bloatoid
Description:
Caleb will need to muster all his strength to take down the mighty Tchernobog, who has managed to free himself from the grip of death.

Death Wish is a campaign for Blood with over 30 new levels, cut scenes, and more. All levels have been adapted so that Co-op play is not only possible, but enhanced with a helpful checkpoint system. The campaign includes several secret levels which all connect back to their episodes through special transitional missions.

The entire mod was developed by a single mapper, Bloatoid, who has been editing with the Build engine for many years. The original Death Wish was created between January 2010 and October 2011. Updates have been made over the years based on feedback from players and observing online streamers, as well as the addition of several extra secret levels. A 4th episode is in development.

Let the festival of Blood continue!

Author: Bloatoid
Description:

Name: Fleshed Out
Author: Skobbejak Games
Description: After the death of Tchernobog, the surviving members of the Cabal openend up alternate spirit worlds to grow their army again. They are planning to create a new God and rule the world once and for all. So get the guns ready, Caleb is about make a bloody mess again..

Name: French Meat 2
Author: TEDD
Description:
After the French Meat episode for BLOOD, the second with 8 new maps including new tiles and soundtracks for an adventure with a unique atmosphere immersed in the heart of paradise island colonized by the pirates of Cabal! kill them all, make a maximum of death, blow them up, slaughter them wherever they are.

INCLUDING :

- French Meat episode 1 updated : 9 maps

- French Meat episode 2 : 8 maps + new tiles

Name: Hostile Takeover
Author: Bloatoid
Description: A new episode that features some great level design from Bloatoid, the author of Death Wish.

Name: The Lost Episode
Author: Maz
Description: This Episode is made up of eight maps taken straight from the leaked alpha. There are minor changes in aesthetics in a few of the maps however teh author made sure to keep all maps as close to the original author's intentions and art direction as possible.

Name: Marrow
Author: Nick Palsmeier
Description:
Tchernobog lays dead, his form fading away from the world as Caleb turns his back to the smoldering corpse. Vengeance sated, he leaves the Hall of the Epiphany behind. Feeling no less disdain for the world than he did with Ophelia, and experiencing none of the joy she brought, he returns to the grave to die once more. A hopefully final resting place.

The Cabal had been scattered far and wide by the gunman's path of revenge, but in his absence they regathered, regrouped, motivated out of their own sense of vengeance. Caleb was their general, the chosen one of their dark god and he had betrayed them all twice over.

He must burn for rejecting the honor of being sacrificed, for striking at Tchernobog. This suffering is best repaid by the tongues of Cerberus. Gathering his remains, the diaspora cinders of his pit, they enacted plans to resurrect him, and sought out Caleb's newfound grave, and bring him face to face with a fiery end.

- A complete brand new episode.

- Control Caleb as he carves a swath of carnage through the Cabal.

- Experience ten brand new levels!

- Using only assets from the original game, crafting a dark and horrific journey for Caleb.

Name: Polished Cryptic Passage
Author: Sir Seizhak
Description:
A polished (or patched) version of Cryptic Passage, the official expansion pack for Blood.

Introduction
Basically, PCP keeps the original level design and gameplay but improves texturing, fixes mapping errors and lighting (very, very slightly touches in this regard). You can say this is a curated version of CP.
If you want to play an improved version of Cryptic Passage, say no more: get this patch!

Name: Trauma Therapy
Author: Nick Palsmeier
Description: Caleb has won over the Cabal and destroyed the evil god Tchernobog. A short time has passed but Caleb can not find any rest. He is tormented by horrid dreams and visions that are haunting him and he has trouble distinguishing reality from dream. Awaking one day in hospital having no idea how he got there he seesonly one solution to his agony. He has to find the three vessels of Tchernobogs Aura to resurrect him and kill him for the last time in hope of finding peace and rest.

Name: Gothic Library DX
Author: MetHy
Description: Gothic Library DX aims at merging the final version of the map with the rooms and layout of the beta version, while also filling in the empty rooms in the process. The goal is to stick as close as possible to the original intent and to the style of the two original authors. Thus, giving the map the few extra minutes of gameplay I feel it should have had. More info in the Making Of folder, if you care so much as to read through that.

Name: Black Phantasm
Author: Dzierzan
Description: This pack replaces Phantasm sprites with the black variant

Name: Cultists with correct guns
Author: Dzierzan
Description:
This mod gives every cultist his correct weapon. So that means you'll see Ackolyte with actual TNT, Cultist with a shotgun, Fanatic with a tommy gun and finally Zealot with tesla gun.

Also included:

- actual gibbing animation for innocents,

- differrent sprites for cultist's electrocution,

- Stone Gargoygle having actual blue eyes when shooting,

- Blood Alpha Cultist's beast transformation animation,

Name: SmoothBlood
Author: Dzierzan, Phredreeke
Description: This is a modification for Blood which allows playing the game with smoother weapon animations. This mod supports all so far modern ways of playing Blood, which are NBlood, Raze, BloodGDX and Fresh Supply. DOS version is not supported.

Name: Voxel Pack
Description: Voxel replacements for sprites in Blood

Name: Duke Hard
Author: Duke4
Description: Inspired by the movie Die Hard, the episode consists of 17 levels by 15 different map designers and progresses from the lobby to the rooftop of a skyscraper. Each level is confined to its own floor of the building, and although each floor features a different theme, various design constraints ensure a certain degree of consistency throughout the episode.

Name: Liquidator 3D
Author: fgsfds, A.B.T., Partizan Software
Description:
Liquidator is an obscure Russian game illegally made using Build Engine and published in 1998 by Akella Company, who later made an infamous Postal 3.

The game includes all-new graphics, sounds, and 3 campaigns with total of 6 maps.

Name: Nude Patch
Author: fgsfds
Description: This mod provides art replacement that partially or fully removes clothes from female NPCs and posters in OG Duke 3D and its addons

Name: Voxel Pack
Description: Voxel replacements for sprites in Duke Nukem 3D

Name: Widescreen Fixes
Author: NightFright2k19
Description: This file provides widescreen graphics to make Duke Nukem 3D look a bit more polished and visually complete for EDuke32 users.

Name: World Tour Red Crosses
Description: This mod brings back red crosses of the medkits in World Tour edition of the game

Name: Voxel Pack
Description: Voxel replacements for sprites in Ion Fury

Name: Redneck Rampage Soundtrack
Description: Original soundtrack for Redneck Rampage and Route 66

Name: Rides Again Soundtrack
Description: Original soundtrack for Redneck Rampage Rides Again

Name: Voxel Pack
Description: Voxel pack for Redneck Rampage that only has one voxel: the key =)

Name: Return to Ruins
Author: Oasiz, MetHy, Daedolon
Description:
This is a 3 maps episode for the PC DOS version of Exhumed / Powerslave.

New maps for a game with no official modding support. 20 years after its release.

The maps were built with an episodic format in mind, but unlike in the original game, they were also designed so that each can be played separetely with a fresh start.

Name: El-Gizah
Author: Slawomir LAW Lawrynowicz
Description: Medium sized map for a Exhumed/Powerslave game. Level features a marsh, desert, pyramid, temple and of course the mighty Sphinx.

Name: Temple of the Fire and the Water
Author: pagb666
Description:
The Kilmaat plans were thwarted, however the remaining troops are up to no good. You must venture into the Temple of the Fire and the Water and retrieve the ashes of Anubis before they use them for their evil deeds.

This level can be completed in two different ways. The advised way is clockwise, as it features a more natural progression. I can perfectly be finished counter-clockwise, but it'll be more quirky, because of the quirky weapons ;)

Name: Alternative M60
Author: fgsfds, Dzierzan
Description: A simple addon which replaces M60 weapon with alternative one.

Name: High Quality Sound Effects
Author: Dzierzan
Description: This mod replaces original sounds with high quality ones based on actual sources. If a specifc sound's source was not found, then the sound was upscaled.

Name: Voxel Pack
Description: This pack provides voxel replacements for sprites in Powerslave/Exhumed

Name: Twin Dragon
Author: Wylde Productions, Level Infinity
Description:
Twin Dragon is an official expansion to the Shadow Warrior that was released as a free download on July 4, 1998.

The game reveals that Lo Wang has a twin brother, Hung Lo, with whom he was separated in early childhood. Hung Lo becomes a dark person whose goal is to destroy the world. Similar to Master Zilla, he uses the creatures from the dark side, criminal underworld and Zilla's remnants to further his goals. Lo Wang has to journey through his dark minions, reach his palace and defeat the evil Twin Dragon Hung Lo once and for all. When he reaches the palace, Lo Wang defeats his brother by shooting a Nuke at him, which kills Hung Lo in the process.

The game features 13 new levels, new sounds, artwork and a new final boss, Hung Lo, who replaced Zilla.

Name: Wanton Destruction
Author: Sunstorm Interactive
Description:
Wanton Destruction is an official expansion that was created by Sunstorm Interactive and tested by 3D Realms, but was not released by the distributor. It was found on September 5, 2005 and was released for free.

The add-on chronicles Lo Wang's adventures after the original game. He visits his relatives in USA, but is forced to fight off Zilla's forces again. The game culminates with a battle against Master Zilla above the streets of Tokyo, which ends with Master Zilla's death.

The game features 12 new levels, new artwork and a few new enemy replacements, such as human enemies; though they still act like their original counterparts.

Name: When I Was Young
Author: TheUnbeholden
Description:
This story takes places some years before the game does; Lo Wang is a bad boy and he is working for local mafia. Two sections of the local chinese mafia battle to gain control of the city. One clan is led by Mr Takagy, the other one by Mr Fu Kung. You are member of Mr Takagy's clan, and got to do the dirty jobs for him... (you might also have to deal with the police)

- 11 single player levels + 1 secret level (technically 2 secret levels, but same twice) + 6 in-between levels + 2 'bonus' levels

- coop & wangbang capabilities in all 11 main levels

- 2 new weapons (unfinished, thus looking really ugly but I kept it for fun)

- new arts

- a little new intro animation

- a story :-)

- new talk

- weather effects

Name: High Quality Sound Effects
Author: Dzierzan
Description: This mod replaces original sounds with high quality ones based on actual sources. If a specifc source was not found, then a sound was upscaled.

Name: High Quality Sound Effects Twin Dragon
Author: Dzierzan
Description: This mod replaces original sounds with high quality ones based on actual sources. If a specifc source was not found, then a sound was upscaled.

Name: High Quality Sound Effects Wanton Destruction
Author: Dzierzan
Description: This mod replaces original sounds with high quality ones based on actual sources. If a specifc source was not found, then a sound was upscaled.

Name: Voxel Pack
Description: Additional voxel models for Shadow Warrior 1997 video game

Name: Widescreen Fixes
Description: This file provides widescreen graphics for Shadow Warrior weapons
